notes.text: You can now use separators for grouped actions
You can now use the colorPalette property in the Status building block
We now provide an API on the Table building block to select contexts or clear the selection
You can now use semantically connected fields in tables
We've resolved an issue with selecting cells in a grid table
We now ensure that the setSelectionVariant API works correctly in tables
You can now set menu items defined using DataActionForGroup to be navigable
We now correctly resolve action parameter values when the Common.Text annotation points to a property with the same name
We now ensure that the Enabled property of actions is bound correctly for grouped table actions in custom sections
